coop_briefing_intro.title: Briefing
coop_briefing_intro.description: A quick briefing before you head out.

coop_briefing_intro__line0.text: Listen carefully. Today you're operating as a team. Everyone is responsible for their role.
coop_briefing_intro__line0.stageDirection: Instructor pulls a strange glowing artifact from beneath the counter.

coop_briefing_intro__line1.text: Stay together, share information, and don't duplicate tasks. You only get one chance to keep everything clean.
coop_briefing_intro__line1.stageDirection: The instructor keeps scanning the room.

test_consultation_scene.title: Consultation with the Crew
test_consultation_scene.description: You spotted a vendor offering you a suspicious deal.

test_consultation_scene__line0.text: Hey, friend! I have something special for you. An artifact from the Zone, genuine and verified. All yours for 500 maroks.
test_consultation_scene__line0.stageDirection: The merchant pulls a strange glowing object from under the counter.

test_consultation_scene__line1.text: The item really emits a faint glow. The merchant looks nervous, constantly scanning the crowd.
test_consultation_scene__line1.stageDirection: He keeps glancing around, every few seconds checking the perimeter.

logic.text: The price is inflated two or three times. Zone artifacts rarely cost more than 200 maroks. Either this is counterfeit or extremely dangerous. His nervousness is a red flag.

perception.text: It smells like ozone and something metallic. The glow is too even for a natural anomaly. There are three more pieces like this under the counter. This is not a unique find.

empathy.text: He's scared. Not of you—of something else. Maybe he needs to ditch these quickly. Could be in debt. Or the artifacts are stolen.

knowledge.text: Something's wrong. The inner voice shouts 'trap'. Maybe the object is being tracked. Or this is bait for something bigger.

authority.text: He is weak. Press him and the price drops to 200 or he hands it over for free. Remember: intimidation leaves tracks. Someone could notice.

drama.text: All merchants are liars. All artifacts on the market are fake. The only lesson is: trust no one and walk away.

buy_artifact.label: Buy the artifact (500 maroks)
buy_artifact.description: Take the risk and secure the item.

test_consultation_scene__bought.text: Excellent choice, friend! You won't regret it... I hope.
test_consultation_scene__bought.stageDirection: The merchant snatches the money and melts into the crowd.

test_consultation_scene__negotiated.text: F-fine, all right! 300 maroks, last price!

test_consultation_scene__refused.text: You shake your head and step away. The merchant already eyes the next victim.
